# felmat

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="felmat"
  data-host="felmat.net"
  data-fmt="banner"
  data-fmk="U12473_n2cJD"
  data-fmp="0"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact https://www.felmat.net/service/inquiry.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-host`
-   `data-fmt`
-   `data-fmk`
-   `data-fmp`
